REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1857 reute u f BC-JIFFY-LUBE-<JLUB>-CAN 03-19 0047

TEXT.TITLE: JIFFY LUBE <JLUB> CAN'T EXPLAIN STOCK ACTION
TEXT.BODY: Jiffy Lube International Inc said it can't account for the drop in its stock price. The company's stock is currently trading at 29-1/2 bid, 29-7/8 bid. Yesterday in NASDAQ trading it fell 4-1/4 to close at 31. Reuter
